cause.description:
Looking for a purpose? Adventure? Excitement? A challenge? Well then join up! If you have any reason at all to join the service, then join this group! HOO-RAH!
Please Note: when joining this group, please state whether u plan on joining the military, or whether u are just a supporter. If joining the military, please state the branch, as well as hopes for your part in the military.
1. The U.S. Service gives us a chance to live outside the averge American's life.
2. The Service builds strength, commitment, trust, and faith.
3. The military is a nessesity for the defense of the American people, join up today!
cause.mission: get people to join one of the 4 military branches
cause.name: Join up, fall in!
